name: Shasta Health
headline: Get physical therapy at home, covered by insurance
description:
Shasta Health enables physical therapists to go independent, so they make 3X more than working for a traditional clinic. Our AI agents automatically find patients, handle scheduling, and bill insurance so our PTs can focus on providing care.

Patients get a concierge in-home appointment that's fully covered by insurance, instead of being stuck on endless waitlists. Book an appointment today at www.shasta.health
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:computer-vision; industry:digital-health; industry:healthcare; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Srinjoy Majumdar, Founder
founders.description: Srinjoy is co-founder and CEO at Shasta Health. Previously, he was a Senior Software Engineer at Microsoft on the HoloLens AR Headset. He led and delivered several computer-vision projects at Microsoft while working closely with companies in healthcare and construction. In college, he studied ECE at UT Austin while working part-time as a Software Engineer at GitHub and an undergraduate researcher at two healthcare robotics labs.

founders.name: Pransu Dash, Founder
founders.description: Pransu is the co-founder of Shasta Health. He was most recently an engineer at Athelas (YC W16) building medical billing and AI software while working with many healthcare customers. He also brings experience in telehealth research from his time studying computer science at UC Berkeley. In previous roles, Pransu also was a key member leading software development at a series of companies including Atlassian and Cockroach Labs.

# Get Physical Therapy At Home
Covered by insurance, with co-pays as low as $0
Get Started
Get Started
Rated 5 stars by hundreds of patients
Pain Relief
Experience
Convenience
![Old Man stretching with exercise band](https://www.shasta.health/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FnewHero.f4f1009e.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
## We work with your _insurance_
Our billing experts will help you navigate your insurance benefits and get you the most out of your plan.
![Cigna](https://www.shasta.health/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCigna-Logo.1426f6ae.png&w=3840&q=75)

And More!
![Cigna](https://www.shasta.health/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FCigna-Logo.1426f6ae.png&w=3840&q=75)

And More!
## Care designed for _you_
Our physical therapists have years of experience treating a wide range of conditions. We'll work with you to develop a personalized plan to help you get better, faster.
[![Senior Walking](https://www.shasta.health/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FSeniorWatering.7490bac6.png&w=1080&q=75)Mobility for SeniorsRecover from falls, arthritis, and other mobility issues with expert-guided training from physical therapists.](https://www.shasta.health/</conditions/mobility-for-seniors>)[![Senior Walking](https://www.shasta.health/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FLongCovid.9925fe78.png&w=1080&q=75)Long Covid & ME/CFSGet expert-guided training from physical therapists that have studied the latest protocols for ME-CFS](https://www.shasta.health/</conditions/long-covid-and-me-cfs>)[![Senior Walking](https://www.shasta.health/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FJointPain.2d3dddf1.png&w=1080&q=75)Surgery RehabOur PTs are trusted by top surgeons and follow expert-backed protocols to help you recover faster.](https://www.shasta.health/</conditions/surgery-rehab>)[![Senior Walking](https://www.shasta.health/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FTMJ.962e1a65.png&w=1080&q=75)TMJ Jaw PainDecrease headaches and persistent jaw pain. Learn from TMJ specialists on how to increase strength and mobility ](https://www.shasta.health/</conditions/tmj-disorders>)
## Why choose in-home physical therapy?
  * Tired of being on waitlists?
Get physical therapy **today** - no waiting, start now, and no referral needed
  * Don't have time?
Save **4 hours/week** without the commute, traffic and waiting rooms
  * Don't feel heard?
Our PTs have years of experience and will take the time to listen to you and develop a personalized plan.
  * Want more 1-on-1 time?
Each Shasta Health session includes 1 hour of 1-on-1 time with a licensed professional PT. No PT Aides, assistants or health coaches.
  * Feel cramped in stuffy treatment rooms?
Get care in the comfort of your home with in-home and virtual appointments.


## What others are saying
The therapy I didn't know I needed!
I had a stiff joint for a long time after an injury since I thought it recovered and my doctor never recommended physical therapy. But after doing some exercises with my Shasta provider, I found out how much mobility I was missing. And keeping up with my exercises has never been easier!
California Patient
A Game Changer!
Shasta health has truly been a game changer for my half-marathon training! I was very quickly connected with the perfect physical therapist after sharing my goals through their intake process. My PT helped me avoid a major injury and successfully complete the marathon
Upasana P.
Legendary!
I felt an immediate improvement after the first session. My PT assigned exercises that were tough, but super effective. Shasta Health made it easier to connect with a high quality PT and get pain relief from home
Kapilan V.
Truly seamless experience!
Session was great! Loved the advice my therapist dispensed. Shasta's tools and video calls were really seamless to use too. Just one session solved my wrist pain
George W.
## How it works
![Physical Therapists](https://www.shasta.health/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FPhysicalTherapists.9e53ec25.png&w=1080&q=75)
Choose an expert physical therapist 
We only work with PTs (no PTAs). All of our PTs are licensed and board-certified. Choose from experts in orthopedics, sports, pediatrics, and more.
![Treatment](https://www.shasta.health/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpexels-kampus-production-6111585.2233b225.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
Get 1:1 care in the comfort of your home 
Skip the commute and choose between in-home or virtual care. Your PT comes prepared with a customized treatment plan based on your goals and schedule.
![Engaging Exercises](https://www.shasta.health/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpexels-michelle-leman-6798576.44cc34e5.jpg&w=1920&q=75)
Get 24/7 Support 
Our PT will help set attainable goals and provide you with the tools to achieve them. Message us anytime, and schedule follow-ups in minutes.
## Expert Physical Therapists
Choose from a large network of certified physical therapists and providers

And many more...
## Frequently asked questions
### Doesn't physical therapy need equipment from the clinic?
### Do I need a prescription or referral to see a Shasta Physical Therapist?
### When and where can I have my appointment?
### Can I see the same physical therapist every session?
### Don't I need to be in a clinic to get physical therapy?
## Take the step towards pain relief today
Your pain might be mild and nagging, or more serious, but it never seems to go away. Maybe you think it will never go away. It's frustrating because it distracts you from work, your daily life, the little things, doing the activities and sports you love. You put it off. The more you put it off, the longer it persists. Maybe you have given up on it. The good news is you don't have to live in pain. See what's possible for you and your health today. Get freedom from your pain, so you don't have that nagging annoyance stopping you from your busy life. 
[Check Availability](https://www.shasta.health/</requestAppointment>)

generated_description:
**Shasta Health: Transforming Physical Therapy with Convenience and Innovation**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, Shasta Health is revolutionizing the way patients receive physical therapy by bringing it right to their doorstep. Based in San Francisco, this nimble startup operates with a small but dedicated team of just two employees, focused on a considerable mission: to make physical therapy accessible, convenient, and fully covered by insurance.

### Mission
At its heart, Shasta Health aims to provide physical therapy at home, eliminating the cumbersome process of waitlists and tedious clinic visits. Their service is covered by various insurance plans, often leading to co-pays as low as $0 for patients.

### How It Works
Shasta Health enables physical therapists (PTs) to operate independently, allowing them to earn three times more than in traditional clinics. The company's intelligent AI agents streamline the process by automatically finding patients, handling scheduling, and managing insurance billing. This allows PTs to focus on what they do best: providing personalized care.

Patients can book appointments directly through the website (www.shasta.health), enjoying an in-home, concierge-level service. Each session boasts an hour of one-on-one time with a licensed professional, free from assistants or aides—just pure, focused therapy.

### What They Treat
Shasta Health caters to a range of conditions, from surgery rehabilitation to long COVID recovery, ensuring that every patient’s needs are met with expertise and care. Their tailored approach results in personalized treatment plans that expedite recovery while addressing specific patient goals.

### Why Choose Shasta Health?
1. **Immediate Care**: Say goodbye to waitlists. Get treatment without delay and without needing a referral.
2. **No Commute**: Access therapy from the comfort of your home. Save time by eliminating travel.
3. **Personalized Attention**: Enjoy dedicated time with experienced PTs who prioritize your needs and develop tailored plans.
4. **Comfort & Convenience**: Each session takes place at home or via virtual appointments—no more cramped clinic rooms.

### Success Stories
Patients rave about the turnaround in their health journeys thanks to Shasta Health. From marathon training breakthroughs to recovery from nagging injuries, the feedback highlights how this approach has reshaped their experiences with physical therapy.

### The Team Behind Shasta Health
With the backing of a visionary partner and a commitment to healthcare innovation, Shasta Health is not just another health startup—it's a transformational service aiming to redefine rehabilitation. 

For anyone seeking relief from pain or a better way to approach their recovery, Shasta Health offers a clear path: expert care, tailored plans, and a level of service that prioritizes the patient's experience above all.

If you're interested in scheduling an appointment or simply exploring how home physical therapy can help you, visit [Shasta Health](https://www.shasta.health) or call their friendly concierge team at (833) 270-9820. Don’t let pain hold you back. Let Shasta Health guide you toward recovery today.
